detaileddescription.para: Interval between compact filter checkpoints. See BIP 157.
Get a block filter index by type. Returns nullptr if index has not been initialized or was already destroyed.
Iterate over all running block filter indexes, invoking fn on each.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::function< std::unique_ptr< interfaces::Chain >()> make_chain, BlockFilterType filter_type, size_t n_cache_size, bool f_memory=false, bool f_wipe=false)
memberdef.name: InitBlockFilterIndex

detaileddescription.para: Initialize a block filter index for the given type if one does not already exist. Returns true if a new index is created and false if one has already been initialized.

Destroy the block filter index with the given type. Returns false if no such index exists. This just releases the allocated memory and closes the database connection, it does not delete the index data.
Destroy all open block filter indexes.
